Key Match Events: Mihail Caimacov scored the opening goal for Moldova in the 31st minute
Ion Nicolaescu scored a penalty for Moldova in the 45th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: Malta was shorn of some key personnel such as defensive duo Enrico Pepe and Steve Borg and influential midfielder Teddy Teuma
Others: Malta's ambition of winning promotion in the UEFA Nations League suffered a simmering blow as the national team slumped to a disappointing defeat to Moldova
Moldova fully deserved their win as they were in control against a Malta side that was struggling to keep hold of the ball
The loss of Teuma was a major blow for Malta as the team lacked any flair moving forward
The inclusion of Montebello after the break added more threat but still was not enough to avoid defeat
Malta will now have to beat Andorra in La Vella on Tuesday to keep their flickering hopes alive ahead of their decisive clash against Moldova at the National Stadium on October 13
